articles.title: New mosquito net reduces malaria cases in Africa: study - CTV News
articles.description: A mosquito net coated with a new insecticide that makes the insects unable to move or fly has reduced cases of malaria in children by about 40 per cent, according to a new study conducted in Tanzania involving Canadian researchers.
